import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{fetchAll}from"../api/pokemonApi";import PokemonCard from"../components/PokemonCard";import PokemonFilter from"../components/PokemonFilter";import AddPokemonForm from"../components/AddPokemonForm";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PokemonPage(){const[list,setList]=useState([]);// Pokémon array

const filteredList=Array.isArray(list)?list.filter(p=>{const matchesSearch=p.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase());const matchesType=type==="ALL"||p.type===type;return matchesSearch&&matchesType;}):[];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:20},children:"Pok\xE9mon Collection"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PokemonFilter,{search:search,setSearch:setSearch,type:type,setType:setType}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddPokemonForm,{onAdded:handleAdded}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center"},children:"Loading Pok\xE9mon..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center",color:"red"},children:error}),!loading&&!error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"grid",gridTemplateColumns:"repeat(auto-fill, minmax(220px, 1fr))",gap:"16px",padding:"20px"},children:filteredList.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PokemonCard,{p:p},p.id))}),!loading&&!error&&filteredList.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center"},children:"No Pok\xE9mon found."})]});}
